channel.title: [pi] Multi
channel.description:
hi i wanna make a multi npc zone so more thn one player at a time can attack the npcs
these are the four corners of the area i want to be multi i know how to make and add the formula but i dont know what order to put the coords in if you could tell me how id be most greatful...
x3311,y9189 x3276,y9189 x3276,y9204 x3311,y9204
thanks
+tyco+
